info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 21 at 10:15PM EST until December 22 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Gaylordsville. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Flood stage. Water reaches New Milford Foundry and Youngfield Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:01 PM EST Thursday the stage was 8.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage overnight and continue falling to 5.8 feet early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Gaylordsville Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Thu 10 pm: 8.1 Forecast: Fri 1 am 7.9 Fri 7 am 7.7 Fri 1 pm 7.4 Fri 7 pm 7.2 Sat 1 am 6.9 Sat 7 am 6.7 Sat 1 pm 6.5 Sat 7 pm 6.3 Sun 1 am 6.2 Sun 7 am 6.0 Sun 1 pm 5.8 &&
